languages.text: {n}Непокорные проповедники были в кандалах доставлены в святилища Экклезиархии, чтобы в смирении и послушании учиться истинному пониманию Кредо. Их паства, устрашенная невысказанной угрозой расправы над своими духовными лидерами, утихла.{/n}

{n}The disobedient preachers were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of the Creed through humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by unspoken threats of violent reprisals against their spiritual leaders, have since fallen silent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Непокорные проповедники были в кандалах доставлены в святилища Экклезиархии, чтобы в смирении и послушании учиться истинному пониманию Кредо. Их паства, устрашенная невысказанной угрозой расправы над своими духовными лидерами, утихла.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The disobedient pastors were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of Creed in humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by the unspoken death threat to their spiritual leaders, had calmed down.{/n}

{n}The disobedient pastors were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of Creed in humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by the unspoken death threat to their spiritual leaders, had calmed down.{/n}

{n}The disobedient preachers were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of the Creed through humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by unspoken threats of violent reprisals against their spiritual leaders, have since fallen silent.{/n}

{n}The disobedient pastors were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of the Creed through humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by unspoken threats of violent reprisals against their spiritual leaders, have since calmed down.{/n}

{n}The disobedient pastors were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of the Creed through humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by unspoken threats of violent reprisals against their spiritual leaders, have since calmed down.{/n}

{n}The disobedient preachers were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of the Creed through humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by unspoken threats of violent reprisals against their spiritual leaders, have since fallen silent.{/n}

{n}The disobedient preachers were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of the Creed through humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by unspoken threats of violent reprisals against their spiritual leaders, have since fallen silent.{/n}

{n}The disobedient preachers were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of the Creed through humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by unspoken threats of violent reprisals against their spiritual leaders, have since fallen silent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些反抗国教的布道士被戴上镣铐，带进了国教的圣所，通过谦卑与服从来学习圣典的真理。暴力报复的意味不言而喻，他们的信众被这样的威胁吓倒，从此不再惹是生非。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The disobedient preachers were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of the Creed through humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by unspoken threats of violent reprisals against their spiritual leaders, have since fallen silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那些反抗国教的布道士被戴上镣铐，带进了国教的圣所，通过谦卑与服从来学习圣典的真理。暴力报复的意味不言而喻，他们的信众被这样的威胁吓倒，从此不再惹是生非。{/n}
{n}那些反抗国教的牧师被戴上镣铐，带进了国教的圣所，通过谦卑与服从来学习圣典的真理。暴力报复的意味不言而喻，他们的信众被这样的威胁吓倒，从此不再惹是生非。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los predicadores desobedientes fueron encadenados y transportados a los santuarios de la Eclesiarquía para que aprendieran el verdadero significado del Credo mediante la humildad y la obediencia. Su rebaño, intimidado por las amenazas tácitas de represalias violentas contra sus líderes espirituales, no ha vuelto a dar problemas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The disobedient preachers were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of the Creed through humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by unspoken threats of violent reprisals against their spiritual leaders, have since fallen silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los predicadores desobedientes fueron encadenados y transportados a los santuarios de la Eclesiarquía para que aprendieran el verdadero significado del Credo mediante la humildad y la obediencia. Su rebaño, intimidado por las amenazas tácitas de represalias violentas contra sus líderes espirituales, no ha vuelto a dar problemas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}不従順な説教者たちは手かせをはめられ、謙遜と服従を通して信条の真の意味を学ぶために、帝国聖教会の聖域に連れてこられた。彼らの民は、精神的リーダーに対する暴力による報復という暗黙の脅しに怯えていたが、それ以降落ち着きを取り戻している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The disobedient preachers were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of the Creed through humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by unspoken threats of violent reprisals against their spiritual leaders, have since fallen silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不従順な牧師らは手かせをはめられ、謙遜と服従を通して信条の真の意味を学ぶために、帝国聖教会の聖域に連れてこられた。彼らの民は、精神的リーダーに対する暴力による報復という暗黙の脅しに怯えていたが、それ以降落ち着きを取り戻している。{/n}
{n}不従順な牧師らは手かせをはめられ、謙遜と服従を通して信条の真の意味を学ぶために、帝国聖教会の聖域に連れてこられた。彼らの民は、精神的リーダーに対する暴力による報復という暗黙の脅しに怯えていたが、それ以降落ち着きを取り戻している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les prêcheurs désobéissants sont mis aux fers et amenés dans les sanctuaires de l'Ecclésiarchie pour y apprendre la véritable signification du Crédo par l'humilité et l'obéissance. Leurs ouailles, intimidées par la menace implicite de violentes représailles contre leurs chefs spirituels, se taisent bien vite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The disobedient preachers were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of the Creed through humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by unspoken threats of violent reprisals against their spiritual leaders, have since fallen silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les prêcheurs désobéissants sont mis aux fers et amenés dans les sanctuaires de l'Ecclésiarchie pour y apprendre la véritable signification du Crédo par l'humilité et l'obéissance. Leurs ouailles, intimidées par la menace implicite de violentes représailles contre leurs chefs spirituels, se taisent bien vite.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die ungehorsamen Prediger wurden in Ketten gelegt und in die Heiligtümer der Ekklesiarchie gebracht, um durch Demut und Gehorsam die wahre Bedeutung des imperialen Glaubens zu begreifen. Ihre von der unausgesprochenen Androhung brutaler Repressalien gegen ihre spirituellen Anführer eingeschüchterten Anhänger schweigen seitdem.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The disobedient preachers were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of the Creed through humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by unspoken threats of violent reprisals against their spiritual leaders, have since fallen silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die ungehorsamen Prediger wurden in Ketten gelegt und in die Heiligtümer der Ekklesiarchie gebracht, um durch Demut und Gehorsam die wahre Bedeutung des imperialen Glaubens zu begreifen. Ihre von der unausgesprochenen Androhung brutaler Repressalien gegen ihre spirituellen Anführer eingeschüchterten Anhänger schweigen seitdem.{/n}

{n}Die ungehorsamen Pastoren wurden in Ketten geworfen und in die Heiligtümer der Ekklesiarchie gebracht, um durch Demut und Gehorsam die wahre Bedeutung des imperialen Glaubens zu begreifen. Ihre Anhänger, von unausgesprochenen Drohungen brutaler Repressalien gegen ihre spirituellen Anführer eingeschüchtert, haben sich beruhigt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İtaatsiz vaizler, zincire vurularak tevazu ve itaatkârlık vasıtasıyla İtikat'ın hakiki manasını öğrenecekleri Ekleşiarşi sığınaklarına götürüldü. Ruhani liderlerine karşı gerçekleştirilen şiddetli misillemelerin dile getirilmeyen tehditlerinden gözleri korkan cemaat mensupları ise o vakitten beri sessizleşti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The disobedient preachers were shackled and brought into the sanctuaries of the Ecclesiarchy to learn the true meaning of the Creed through humility and obedience. Their flock, intimidated by unspoken threats of violent reprisals against their spiritual leaders, have since fallen silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İtaatsiz vaizler, zincire vurularak tevazu ve itaatkârlık vasıtasıyla İtikat'ın hakiki manasını öğrenecekleri Ekleşiarşi sığınaklarına götürüldü.
